title: question about mordes ult.
body: Does mordes captured spirit's auto attacks apply rylais slowing effects?

replies.body: But it won't apply things like statikk as far as I know. It counts as a spell and therefore applies spell effects (like rylais) but it wont apply and on hit effects like statikk/runaans etc (to the best of my knowledge)
It applied braums mountain stacks when i was clearing a creep wave, made me laugh

because the ghost is a spell champ, so it applies spell effects like spellvamp, but it cant proc oh hit effects like shiv, but because braums stacks are external and get applied by champs, it will stack those when it hits
